text: John Paton Laurie (25 March 1897 - 23 June 1980) was a Scottish actor who was known for his role as James Frazer in the British sitcom Dad's Army. Laurie was born on 25 March 1897 in Dumfries, Dumfriesshire, Scotland. He was married three times. He had one daughter. Laurie died on 23 June 1980 in his Chalfont St Peter, Buckinghamshire, England home from emphysema, aged 83The Times, death notice, 25 June 1980 His ashes were scattered into the English Channel. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1897 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People from Dumfries Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish television actors
title: John Laurie
